name: running_processes
description: List of all running processes with full arguments.

name: active_network_connections
description: Lists all listening ports and active network connections.

name: open_files
description: Lists all files currently held open by processes.

name: logged_in_users
description: Shows who is currently logged into the system.

name: bash_history
description: Collects command history for all users.

name: authentication_logs
description: Collects logs for logins and authentication attempts.

name: cron_jobs
description: Collects all scheduled tasks for persistence.
command: find /etc/cron* -type f -exec cat {} \; && find /var/spool/cron* -type f -exec cat {} \;

name: temp_directories
description: Lists contents of common staging directories for malware.
